|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Product Name: ARMOR Z1 *Model Number: NBG6816
"45-601-000573" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2658762 FCC photos]. :OUI: 0C:4C:39 (MitraStar Technology Corp.) - [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2658761 FCC label]
{{See also|ZyXEL NBG6815|ZyXEL NBG6817|MitraStar}}
===System Specifications=== *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Wireless Speed: 600Mbps (2.4GHz), 1733Mbps (5GHz) *Wireless Security: WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK *Wireless Features: Guest Wi-Fi, WPS, WMM *Auto WAN type detection: Static IP, DHCP, PPPoE *Operation Mode: Router, Access Point
===Hardware Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] 1.4GHz dual core processor *Memory: 512MB RAM and 4GB eMMC flash *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 4x LAN GbE, 2x USB 3.0 *Antenna: 4x dual-band high power external antennas *Buttons: Wireless on/off, Power on/off, WPS, Reset *Power: 12V DC / 4A; Power Consumption: 29W max.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32535-linksys-e8350-ac2400-dual-band-gigabit-wi-fi-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ([[Linksys E8350]]) * [https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/pozostale/zyxel-armor-z1-r258/ On '''Openitforum''']
